REMARKS: Located in the sought after Bentley University/Gann Academy area, this spacious ranch was built by the Devincent Brothers and is set on nearly one-half acre of land with tall trees & partial views of Bentley Pond. Ready for your renovations, this home features lots of natural sunlight through its full southern exposure. The entry foyer leads into the large combination living/dining room with a fireplace. The kitchen was updated in the early 90's and has St. Charles cabinetry, a Jenn-Air built-in-wall oven and cook-top and recessed lighting. The den is located off the kitchen and has a picture window that overlooks the backyard. Both bedrooms are well-proportioned and share an original ceramic tiled bathroom.
